trans-unit.source: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> objects.
This collection is used as part of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectGroup"></xref> to apply multiple bitmap effects to visual content.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> class.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> class using the given collection.
The collection used for initialization.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> class with a specified capacity, or the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> objects the collection is initially capable of storing.
The initial capacity of the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> at the end of the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to add to the end of the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Removes all effects from the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true.`
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.
The cloned object's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property will be `false` even if the source's <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen"></xref> property was `true`.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Indicates whether the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref>.
This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrameCollection.Count%2A>.
This method determines equality by calling <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The bitmap effect to locate in the collection.
**true** if the collection contains value; otherwise, **false**.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Copies the elements of the collection to an array starting at the given index.
The array to copy to.
The collection index to begin coping.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Gets the number of effects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
The number of effects contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection.Enumerator"></xref> that can iterate through the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Retrieves the index of the first instance of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref>.
The effect to find in the collection.
The index of the specified effect.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> into this collection at the specified index.
The index to insert the effect at.
The specified effect to insert.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> to get or set.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> at the specified index.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> for this collection.
The effect to remove from the collection
`true` if value was removed; otherwise, `false`.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
Remove the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect"></xref> at the specified index from the collection.
The index of the effect to remove.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
The first position in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the copied contents.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
`true` if access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through the collection.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index at which to insert the <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
**Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffectCollection"></xref>.
